questions.question: What is phishing?
answers: It's a new trendy catch-phrase to say fishing!
It's is a type of online scam where hackers impersonate legitimate organizations via email, text message, advertisement or other means in order to steal sensitive information.
It's a novel way hackers steal sensitive information via email, text message, advertisement, or other means.
questions.correct_answer_response: You got it! Be on the lookout for suspicious emails, text messages, etc.
questions.incorrect_answer_response: No that's not it. Sorry buddy!

questions.question: You notice you have an email titled, "Unusual Microsoft activity detected". The email has just one blue link titled "Check recent activity". What do you do?
answers: You click on the link. After all, whats the worst that can happen, right?
questions.correct_answer_response: You got it! This is a very crude attempt at phishing really. This was an easy one mind you!
questions.incorrect_answer_response: No no! An empty email with just a blue link is a HUGE red flag. Just delete it!
